title: leave buster
body:
i was playing a game as rumble and the game suddenly crashed and i dont know why then i tried to reconnect and  it said the game ended and i got a leave buster . 
realy?????  
fix your crashes and bugs riot then give the players leave buster when they (intentionally) leave 
the game crashed and i have nothing to do with it and still got a leave buster
i am starting to hate this game 
trying to play for fun but this is driving me crazy
